ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Tinkering Update News
ygData.msgSnippet: And just how long has the poison upgrade been in the works....i don t think I ll see a Tinkering update in this century. -alewuf of povar ...
ygData.messageBody:
And just how long has the poison upgrade been in the
works....i don't think I'll see a Tinkering update in
this century.

-alewuf of povar

--- Joe D <joed@...> wrote:
>
> On the EQ message boards, Brad/Aradune answered a
> big batch of player
> questions. One concerned tinkering:
>
>
http://boards.station.sony.com/everquest/Forum4/HTML/029927.html
>
> When will we expect to see new improvements to
> Tinkering? Right now there
> are only a handful of marginally useful items to be
> made with it.
>
> **Tinkering has a planned upgrade after we get the
> Poison upgrade in.
>
> Pasketti, Povar
>
